main: ^The nightmares cannot reach us here at the moment
^But the power protecting this place is draining
WhatDo: ^I need you to take the portal to your right into the World Forest Dream
^I need you to ask the World Tree for it's heart
ItsHeart: ^Yes, the World Trees heart has the power to keep the nightmares power away from the Church for a while longer
^We need that power to protect the Church while we search the other Dream Worlds for the Flames of Vision
FlamesOfVision: ^The Flames of Vision are powerful fires that helped form the dream worlds when the stars collided
^If we can bring those Flames back here I believe we can stop the Nightmares from breaking down the DreamScape
